overview: In a city filled with romantic trysts and midnight liaisons, follow one woman's story as she tries to become acclimated to the spontaneous couplings that happen all around her! Juli Ashton stars as a business woman on her first trip to Venice who attempts to make deals with clientele who are more interested with what's in her briefs than what's in her briefcase! Magnificently shot on location in Venice, Italy.
title: Passion in Venice
